about_the_game:
theBestiary is a survival ,medieval ,open world game with RPG elements in which you will hunt night creatures ,build your base ,craft or gather new gear that will help you survive .Explore the ruined Kingdom of Torak and return home with the lost Bestiary .In order to do that you will need to progress true levels , make quests and find a way to conquest the montain that keep you captive.

How will be the gameplay ?
In the early game your goal is to survive, upgrade your base and obtain materials that will help you to craft your early equipment , after this stage you will make quests in order to gather experience , upgrade your skills and hunt beasts in order to get hunt prey which you will need to unlock spell casting . In the end after you are stacked you will go in the chase after theBestiary and after a way to escape from montains.

When the game will be launched ?
I planned that at the end of this year to launch a early access build and in the following months to come out with updates for the game. I expect to finish the game at the end of 2023.

The game will be multiplayer ?
In the first stages of development the game will be only single-player , but in the future I have in plan to make it co-op.
